title: All the Backlist! November 23, 2018
description:
This week, Liberty discusses a few great older books, including Ask the Passengers.
This week’s episode was sponsored by Book Riot Insiders and Penguin Random House Audio.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or Apple Podcasts and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
The Go-Between by L.P. Hartley
May We Be Forgiven by A.M. Homes
Ask the Passengers by A.S. King
Drinking Coffee Elsewhere by Z.Z. Packer
Up from Jericho Tel by E.L. Konigsburg
The Fox by D.H. Lawrence
The Brief History of the Dead by Kevin Brockmeier
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
